title: [FIXED] Ranked Queue Disabled - 17/07/15
body:
Hello Everyone,

We're currently working to fix a bug with the Recall spell. Unfortunately, this particular issue can't be mitigated by disabling a specific champion or item so we've temporarily disabled Ranked while we develop a solution. We'll keep you updated with our progress as we continue triaging the issue.

-Riot Cochese

**UPDATE - 17/07/15, 11:11am AEST**

We have verified full functionality, and ranked queues, have been re-enabled in all regions. Thank you for your patience.

**UPDATE - 17/07/15, 10:15am AEST**

A fix has just passed our quality assurance tests and we are preparing a patch to fix the recall bug. You will not have a patch to download, we are able to fix this without patching to you. Once this is completed, we will re-enable Ranked and I'll post an update here. Thank you for your patience.

replies.body: We've tested our fix against the majority of champions in the time since our last update . We're finishing testing on the remaining few and will have another update within the next few hours. Thanks again for your patience.

Thank you for working so hard on the patch up ^__^
We really appreciate all your work and dedication to this gaming community!

Thank you for the update. Even though we may seem like a bunch of whining children most of us understand and appreciate that the Riot team are doing all they can. The whiners are merely more vocal of their opinions.
Hi would also like to mention thank you riot, but unfortunately the majority of oce has not received the update yet so if it is possible could you please try to speed up the process

Hello everyone,

The only update I have is that we are still working on it. I'm sorry that isn't a good indicator for when Ranked will be back on, but I assure you this is the highest priority for our team right now.

It's not likely we will have Ranked back on tonight, I wish I had better news to share at this time.

-Riot Cochese

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cochese,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=7eKz7fzV,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-07-16T08:09:28.638+0000)
>
> Hello everyone,
> 
> The only update I have is that we are still working on it. I'm sorry that isn't a good indicator for when Ranked will be back on, but I assure you this is the highest priority for our team right now.
> 
> It's not likely we will have Ranked back on tonight, I wish I had better news to share at this time.
> 
> -Riot Cochese

Are we getting the 12 hour update soon???
Not what i wanted to hear :( But thanks for keeping us updated
Cheers For the update Cochese
Chill the fuck out guys, they're doing what they can; obviously they want ranked up just as much as we do. Hell, I'm pretty sure almost all of them if not all play this game as well.
some sort of timeframe would be great rather then, "soon"
It was a surprise bug and they scrambled to find a solution, now they are working on it they may still not know the full extent of the problem hence "soon".
Up for some normals while ranked queues are down Cochese?

> [{quoted}](name=Dyl,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=7eKz7fzV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-16T03:04:27.720+0000)
>
> Up for some normals while ranked queues are down Cochese?

Busy working at the moment, but thanks for the invite. I was planning to play some Twisted Treeline later tonight if you are online.
Isnt the que time like 15 minutes?

is anyone else game not loading in normal's? i just joined a game and it didn't open up the loading screen, and every time i hit reconnect it minimizes the reconnect screen and nothing happens? this has never happened before just now..
I had that bug too. I think it's an issue on your side. Running League as administrator fixed it for me, though I am not sure if that is coincidence or not.
eta?
THE ONE DAY I TAKE OFF WORK. CMON MAN RITO FK {{item:3070}}
Would you rather a faulty recall spell ruining your ranked game?
Fking oath i would
any updates? I got a promo series to finish :S
what exactly did the bug do? I am intrigued.
Well if you ever get a prediction for when the fix should be rolled out, I'd love to know. Thanks!
Is the bug with the Recall spell minor enough that we can we expect Ranked to be back online in 12 hours time?

> [{quoted}](name=Entropic Mirage,realm=NA,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=7eKz7fzV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-16T01:38:45.130+0000)
>
> Is the bug with the Recall spell minor enough that we can we expect Ranked to be back online in 12 hours time?

It's unknown at this time. We are working on a fix, but before we can patch the fix out we need to QA and make sure nothing else breaks in the process. I will keep this thread updated, when there is more to share.
now that you have fixed ranked, you should fix the login issue
Can we play rank 24/24 on ocean server. Many players play rank at night now.

Sooooooo... now that we _don't have ranked to play any more,_ any chance of you reenabling normal draft mode (which you deactivated years back on grounds of "not enough people playing it", regardless of actual evidence), at least in the short term?

No, of course not. Because we're just OCE. Doing anything more than the bare minimal is more than we're worth, ain't that right?
n, n, n, normaalllssss :s{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
6 hours of normal games later {{item:3042}}{{item:3040}}

Appreciate the hours that you spend on the maintenance of the server, but a large percentage of people do play at night, the majority of the Oce community would love a 24/7 ranked que, as the population has increased.
The least you can do now is make rank open 24/7. There are plenty of OCE players who play throughout the night, don't know why the fuck we are so different from all the other servers.
can you bring ranked back up... i just got home from work and its my birthday... I wanted to stream some birthday ranked but its down {{champion:32}}
ffs this is taking forever riot pls
